extendedInfo.description: High precision altimeter using GPS and free altitude data e.g. from the Space Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM). Works without network connection!High Altitude turns your android mobile device into a high precision altimeter. High Altitude makes it possible to use your android device for hiking, mountain biking, hill running, and all other outdoor activities where a high precision altimeter is helpful.While the GPS sensors are able to determine the position on earth with high precision (up to 10 meters or less) the reported altitude is much less reliable (up to 100 meters). High Altitude corrects this by connecting GPS data with altitude data from up the Space Shuttle Radar Topography Mission. These data is downloaded as so-called hgt-files and after downloading no network access is required anymore.In addition, High Altitude shows a topographic map of your surrounding, simply touch that map to get the altitude.New in 1.2: You can instantaneously see the altitude on a (google) map when sliding your finger over it. This works for all regions with previously downloaded altitudes.

reviews.title: most accurate way to measure altitude on earth
reviews.comment: works very well , better than GPS  and better than apps that use Google map data for altitude and this one downloads map data from the shuttle radar topography mission so you don\'t need a data connection to use it unless you want to see a map too . the screen shows altitude latitude and longitude with no data connection if you choose to see map you need connection .,
reviews.author: Kenneth Peckham

reviews.title: Great App ... but
reviews.comment: This is a great application, but it would be a lot better if the developer gave us an option to buy out of the advertising -- it gets in the way of using the map function.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best one
reviews.comment: Could not find a good altimeter until this one. Internet is not needed for a good read out. Great app and its free!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice add - on
reviews.comment: Mainly got this to go along with Oruxmap.
reviews.author: Miika Valve

reviews.title: Not working for northern areas ?
reviews.comment: It failed to download anything for Norway, 71/18.
reviews.author: Andr\303\251 Kjellstrup

reviews.title: Outstanding Product
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried a fistful of these android altimeters and this one is far and above all the others.  It downloads the shuttle data to its own file and coordinates its application to the GPS location without hesitation and provides a very stable readout.  I love it and recommend it highly.  I run it on a HTC Vivid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Up Up & Away
reviews.comment: I live on the side of Black Mountain, Clark County Nevada, City of Henderson, Sun City anthem, Looking down on Las Vegas is a beautiful sight.
reviews.author: Eric Jefferson
